data.title: Follow the Money: The Manchurian Incident, Economic Recovery and Japan’s Policy Change in the 1930s
data.meta_description: Follow the Money: The Manchurian Incident, Economic Recovery and Japan’s Policy Change in the 1930s was published in From Far East to Asia Pacific on page 49.
data.text:

From Far East to Asia Pacific: Great Powers and Grand Strategy 1900–1954, edited by Brian P. Farrell, S.R.
